nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Continuation token from the previous response, for Amazon Bedrock to list the next set of results.

nested_items.name: jobSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of summaries of the evaluation jobs.

nested_items.name: jobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the evaluation job.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name for the evaluation job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the evaluation job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time the evaluation job was created.

nested_items.name: jobType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the evaluation job is automated or human-based.

nested_items.name: evaluationTaskTypes
nested_items.description: The type of task for model evaluation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: modelIdentifiers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the model(s) used for the evaluation job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ragIdentifiers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the knowledge base resources used for a knowledge base evaluation job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: evaluatorModelIdentifiers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the models used to compute the metrics for a knowledge base evaluation job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: customMetricsEvaluatorModelIdentifiers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the models used to compute custom metrics in an Amazon Bedrock evaluation job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: inferenceConfigSummary
nested_items.description: Identifies the models, Knowledge Bases, or other RAG sources evaluated in a model or Knowledge Base evaluation job.

nested_items.name: modelConfigSummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the models used in an Amazon Bedrock model evaluation job. These resources can be models in Amazon Bedrock or models outside of Amazon Bedrock that you use to generate your own inference response data.

nested_items.name: bedrockModelIdentifiers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the models used for the evaluation job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: precomputedInferenceSourceIdentifiers
nested_items.description: A label that identifies the models used for a model evaluation job where you provide your own inference response data.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ragConfigSummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the RAG resources used in an Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Base evaluation job. These resources can be Knowledge Bases in Amazon Bedrock or RAG sources outside of Amazon Bedrock that you use to generate your own inference response data.

nested_items.name: bedrockKnowledgeBaseIdentifiers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the Knowledge Base resources used for a Knowledge Base evaluation job where Amazon Bedrock invokes the Knowledge Base for you.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: precomputedRagSourceIdentifiers
nested_items.description: A label that identifies the RAG sources used for a Knowledge Base evaluation job where you provide your own inference response data.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: applicationType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the evaluation job is for evaluating a model or evaluating a knowledge base (retrieval and response generation).
